name: BleedingEventDiagnosisCodesICD9
title: Bleeding Event Diagnosis Codes ICD9
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains diagnosis codes for conditions that indicate an adverse drug event related to anticoagulant medications. They include conditions that indicate excessive patient bleeding related to anticoagulant medication use, as well as accidental overdose for anticoagulant medications.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who had an adverse drug event related to use of anticoagulant medications. Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element would map to the Diagnosis, Active element.),(Inclusion Criteria: Diagnosis codes that indicate excessive patient bleeding related to anticoagulant medication use, as well as accidental overdose for anticoagulant medications in an inpatient, emergency department, or observation setting should be included in this value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: Diagnosis codes that indicate intentional overdose, substance abuse, or suicide attempt should be excluded from this value set.)
